scripts.fetch-xml: curl -L https://www.bfs.admin.ch/bfsstatic/dam/assets/4924499/master -o tmp/eCH0071.zip && unzip -o tmp/eCH0071.zip eCH0071_*.xml && mv eCH0071_*.xml tmp/
scripts.convert-xml: JVM_ARGS=-Xmx2G mkdir -p target && java -jar tmp/lib/carml-cli.jar -i tmp/eCH0071_*.xml -m config/eCH0071.ttl -of nt -o target/complete.nt
scripts.build: npm-run-all clean fetch-carml fetch-xml convert-xml void-timestamp tdb-load tdb-query tdb-dump validate-riot
scripts.build-local: npm-run-all clean convert-xml void-timestamp tdb-load tdb-query tdb-dump validate-riot
